title: Marnie Simpson's extremely pink bedroom as she wills baby to make an appearance
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Heavily pregnant Marnie Simpson showed off her rather girly pink bedroom as she awaits the appearance of her baby boy.

Frustrated mum-to-be Marnie temporarily distracted herself from the fact she is eight days overdue by giving followers a sneak peek at her plush pad.

The Geordie Shore star, who is "really suffering" took to Instagram to show off the extremely pink room which boasted baby pinks, rose hues and dusky pink interior.

Her four-poster princess bed featured luxury pink bedding decorated with fluffy pillows, while the rest of her huge bedroom included notes of cream and white to compliment the rest.

Marnie's boyfriend and baby daddy Casey Johnson, who she's expecting her first child with, is seen in her latest snap.

(Image: marns/Instagram)

Casey, who started dating the Geordie lass in 2017, also looks fed-up as the little one failed to make a show on it's due date.

Marnie has been open about the fact she's growing tired of waiting for her newborn's late arrival.

She has documented every step of her pregnancy journey with fans, but recently admitted she's been "day dreaming" of what it felt like to not be pregnant.

(Image: marns/Instagram)

In an Instagram post, she shared with her 3.5million followers: "I'm 8 days overdue and really badly suffering. Wanna keep you all updated as much as possible but struggling to even talk.

"Sorry I've been a little inactive it's just I'm so uncomfortable now."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The reality TV babe then thanked her fans for their "constant support" and promised to let them know when "little one has made his arrival".

Just days ago, Marnie told her followers how she has been struggling to sleep since her baby boy is overdue.

(Image: marns/Instagram)

The pregnant star admitted she had the most "restless night sleep ever" and was still waiting.

She recently wrote on Instagram: "I'm so happy me and Casey get to experience this together

"It’s gonna be so intense, my mind can’t cope with the Emotions it’s so overwhelming Im so full of love i could burst!!!!"
description: The Geordie Shore star, 27, took her mind off the fact she's eight days overdue with a sneak peek into her bedroom
